title: Plant Growth in Microgravity
abstract: We studied how Arabidopsis seedlings grow in microgravity. Results show altered cell expansion, root orientation changes, and modified gene expression linked to cell wall remodeling.

title: Muscle Atrophy after Long-Duration Spaceflight
abstract: This study measures muscle loss in astronauts over long-duration missions. We report percent mass loss and improvements from countermeasure exercise.

title: Microbial Behavior in Low Gravity
abstract: E. coli showed altered biofilm formation when cultured under microgravity analog conditions, with implications for contamination control on spacecraft.
